subject: Re: [junit] Fake HTTP request/response implementation
msgSnippet: ... I have a FakeHttpRequestBuilder, but I haven t shipped it yet. The problem is that I ve lost the source (from one location, anyway) of Diasparsoft Toolkit.
messageBody:
Kevin Klinemeier wrote:
> Hey JB,
>
> I want this kind of thing again today, and remembered your junit group
> post. Ship anything yet? :)
>
> Or does anyone know of an implementation that isn't as brittle as the
> com.mockobjects implementation?

I have a FakeHttpRequestBuilder, but I haven't shipped it yet. The
problem is that I've lost the source (from one location, anyway) of
Diasparsoft Toolkit. It might be gone forever. I might have to start a
new project.

How urgent is this to you?
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
